Package com.bitsavior.game

Class World

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.game.World
public class World
extends java.lang.Object
the main class of the game

  • initializes the drawable world
  • creates all actors like player, enemies etc.
  • maintains the game logic dependent on the actual gamestate
  • draws the world

UML class diagram

    alpha value used for the fading effect

    value for coordinating the speed of the fading effect

    value used for Volume during fading

    firework animation for exploding bugs

    holds the actual state of the game to manage different behaviours

    holds the time required for starting a game and animate the entrysequence

    the timer for the time limit of the level

    holds user interface elements as fonts and buttons

    trigger for one time adjustments regarding the translation between run and win gamestate

    manages the player input

    updates the game logic when players looses the game
    void render​(float Delta)
    manages all render calls inside the world
    private void runRender​(float Delta)
    handles the drawing of the scene in a running game takes over when GameState = RUN Notice: lights must be rendered inside the lightbuffer
    private void runUpdate​(float Delta)
    updates the game logic all update functions to be called between handlePlayerInput() and checkCollisions()
    private void spawnEnemies()
    spawn the maximum amount of enemies given by MaxNumberOfEnemies
    private void spawnPickUps()
    spawn the maximum amount of pickups given by MaxNumberOfPickUps

    prepare the game session spawns pickups and enemies, play background music and set the player alive

    handles the drawing of the entry animation takes over when GameState = START Notice: lights must be rendered inside the lightbuffer
    private void startUpdate​(float Delta)
    handles the entry animations including fading in effects etc
    GameState update​(float Delta)
    updates and handles the game logic in dependency of the current gamestate
    private void updateBugs​(float Delta)
    updates the list of bugs
    private void updatePickUps()
    checks if pickups are collected and can be deleted
    private void winUpdate​(float Delta)
    updates the game logic when the player wins the level and controls win animations

  • Constructor Details

    • World

      public World​(GameState gameState, int level)
      initialise required data for the creation of the world
      Parameters:
      gameState - : initialises the gamestate once, to ensure the correct behaviour
      level - : the actual level of the game

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create()
      config camera, map, player and load assets

      private void startGameSession()
      prepare the game session spawns pickups and enemies, play background music and set the player alive

    • update

      public GameState update​(float Delta)
      updates and handles the game logic in dependency of the current gamestate
      Parameters:
      Delta - : elapsed time since last frame
      Returns:
      : the current gamestate

    • startUpdate

      private void startUpdate​(float Delta)
      handles the entry animations including fading in effects etc
      Parameters:
      Delta - : time since the last frame in milliseconds

    • runUpdate

      private void runUpdate​(float Delta)
      updates the game logic all update functions to be called between handlePlayerInput() and checkCollisions()

      Delta - : elapsed time since last frame
